sentences.sContent: He was dashing, self-confident and flirtatious.
sentences.sCn: 他风度翩翩、自信满满且善于调情。

synos.tran: 轻浮的；调情的；爱调戏的

words.tran: 急扔；调情的人；卖弄风骚的人
调情；调戏；挑逗；不认真的考虑
调情；玩弄；轻率地对待；摆动

trans.tranOther: Someone who is flirtatious behaves toward someone else as if they are sexually attracted to them, usually not in a very serious way
